thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com | 3 of 105
thread.title: Henry Alan Stephens
thread.title_full: OFX reviewed by Henry Alan Stephens

author: Henry Alan Stephens
title: Henry Alan Stephens
text:
Fast
Once registered making transfers through OFX from one currency account to another is very fast
Factual
OFX doesn't make mistakes i.e., very efficient
Funding
emails from OFX show "awaiting funds" "received funds" "transmitted funds" so you know exactly where you stand day to day .
